archimate:Requirement.name: R17 Develop maintenance plan & secure resourcing for keeping material up-to-date
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Security Awareness project
U18 As all developers I need a maintenance process & resourcing for the education & material updates & communication to be in place to ensure our work stays up-to-date and brings value also in the future. U29 As all users I want to have up to date material to be able to trust that the information is correct.
